snippet: LEAD: All of the gubernatorial candidates here have campaigned on the promise that they will guard the right of women to choose abortions. But on Sunday night Dianne Feinstein, the only woman in the race, said she opposed abortions for purposes of...
lead_paragraph: LEAD: All of the gubernatorial candidates here have campaigned on the promise that they will guard the right of women to choose abortions. But on Sunday night Dianne Feinstein, the only woman in the race, said she opposed abortions for purposes of sex selection and would consider outlawing them.

headline.main: Abortion Issue Taking Odd Turn in California

byline.original: By JANE GROSS, Special to The New York Times
